data.name: Cadence
data.detailed_description:
Unleash your creativity with the PC’s first ever music sandbox game. Learn to make your own music by drawing beautiful shapes, and then share your favourite creations with the community. Here you can rate other player’s efforts or download them as a starting point for your own songs. There’s also an hour’s worth of head scratching puzzles for you to solve in Campaign mode.

A new way to make music

If you’ve ever tried to use pro audio software you’ll know how intimidating the space shuttle like controls can be. It’s a frustration that smothers curiosity before it’s even begun. But imagine there was a simpler way, a way for anyone to make their first music within minutes? By harnessing gameplay rules and the simple act of drawing, you can use Cadence to start making music right now.

Learn from others

Music is a deep passion that can take a lifetime to master. Cadence provides several tools for you to take more control as your musical confidence increases, but one of the best ways to learn is from others. The built in community browser showcases what’s possible with Cadence, and provides the inspiration for your own creativity with an effortless one-click import feature.

Campaign

Cadence isn’t just a music app, it’s a game as well - featuring an hour’s worth of puzzles (at present) from the award winning designer of Desktop Dungeons. The perfect way to challenge yourself and get your head around the more obscure parts of the game.

data.short_description: You've been playing games most of your life. You've been listening to music even longer. Wouldn't it be great if making music was as easy as playing a game? Cadence lets you draw shapes as music. Let your imagination run free with the PC's first music sandbox game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 2 Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On board

Minimum:

  • Processor: 2 GHz

  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Built-in
